resources.string: TrueItHub Talks — simple messenger, pet-project to improve programming skills and learn new technologies, so minor bugs or errors can occur (feel free to contact me)
Technologies used: Retrofit, OkHttp, WebSockets, MVVM, Navigation Component, Picasso, Ktor
